entry.def: A helix is a spiral shape or form.

example.ex: Coil the fibre into a helix.

means.word_mean: 1. a curve that lies on the surface of a cylinder or cone and cuts the element at a constant angle
2. a structure consisting of something wound in a continuous series of loops;
